about.h3_1: Technologies I use in real projects:
about.aboutMeText_1: I'm Josu√© Cuevas, a software developer with 3+ years of experience building real-world web applications. I focus on writing clean, maintainable code and creating interfaces that feel fast, intuitive, and reliable. I enjoy working closely with designers, clients, and developers to turn ideas into scalable digital products.
about.aboutMeText_2: I specialize in frontend development with a strong focus on performance, usability, and maintainability. I have experience building dashboards, public websites, and backend integrations, always aiming to deliver solutions that are easy to extend and pleasant to use.
about.blockQuote: Building digital products that actually work
about.h3_2: How I approach teamwork and problem-solving

professional_projects.title: Xira
professional_projects.description:
- Implementation of Artificial Intelligence projects for banking, telecommunications, healthcare, customer service, collections, insurance, retail, etc.
 - Development of robust and stable products and solutions using agile methodologies.
 - Documentation of products and solutions.
- Meeting development KPIs for each implemented project, ensuring customer satisfaction.

freelance_projects.title: Real Space
freelance_projects.description: Designed and developed a real estate sales platform to help agencies improve lead conversion and quotation workflows. Implemented automated quotation and PDF generation for client proposals. Built backend services using Node.js and REST APIs, including authentication and role-based access control.

freelance_projects.title: Sennse Juarez
freelance_projects.description: Design and implementation of a comprehensive real estate platform: apartment quoting tool with PDF export and sending, admin dashboard for property management, and public website to display available units.

freelance_projects.title: Porttica
freelance_projects.description: Development of a collaborative digital solution for real estate, including: interactive quoting tool with PDF generation, admin panel for apartment management, and public portal listing properties for sale.

freelance_projects.title: OaxaTech
freelance_projects.description: FullStack project where I designed, developed, and optimized SEO for an online store selling cellphone parts. Using Stripe payment gateway.

freelance_projects.title: My Weather
freelance_projects.description: Frontend project where I designed and developed a weather application to reinforce advanced React knowledge. Consuming the OpenWeatherMap API.

services.title: Front-end Development
services.description: Create visually appealing and user-friendly websites using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Craft engaging user interfaces that optimize the user experience and responsiveness across different devices

services.title: Back-end Development
services.description: Build robust and scalable server-side applications using frameworks like Express.js and Node. Develop secure databases and integrate APIs to ensure seamless functionality and data management.

services.title: Responsive Design
services.description: Ensure your website or application looks and performs flawlessly on various devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile devices. Implement responsive design principles to provide a consistent and optimized experience for your users

services.title: E-commerce Solutions
services.description: Develop custom e-commerce websites with secure payment gateways, inventory management systems, and user-friendly interfaces. Enable your business to sell products or services online effectively

services.title: Web Application Development
services.description: Build dynamic and interactive web applications using modern frameworks like React.js. Implement complex functionality, real-time updates, and seamless user interactions.

footer.text_1: Thank you for taking the time to explore my portfolio. I'm sure you found it informative and inspiring. If you have any questions or potential collaboration I will be happy to help you.
footer.text_2: Please feel free to contact us using the information provided above. Thank you once again, and I look forward to hearing from you soon.
